issue.subject: Problem with accented text search
issue.description:
For now, easySDI remove all accented text which are present inside search criteria (see  \components\com_easysdi_catalog\libraries\easysdi\Cswrecords.php line 40)
PROXY servlet may be causes this trouble and investigation should be made to accept such content witout any content manipulation...

PS: space character is also problematic
